amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds made available by this Act to be used to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the draft resource management plan and supplemental environmental impact statement referred to in the notice of availability titled "Notice of Availability of the Draft Resource Management Plan and Supplemental Environmental Impact Statement for the Colorado River Valley Field Office and Grand Junction Field Office Resource Management Plans, Colorado".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
